PRIEST: Take 1 Student from this card and place it on an Island of your choice.
CHEESEMAKER: During this turn, you take control of any number of Professors
even if you have the same number of Students as the player who currently controls them
HERALD: Choose an Island and resolve the Island as Mother Nature had ended her movement there.
Mother Nature will still move anf the Island where she ends her movement will also be resolved
POSTMAN: You may move Mother Nature up to 2 additional Islands than is indicated by the Assistant card you've played
HERBALIST: Place a No Entry tile on an Island of your choice.
The first time Mother Nature ends her movement there put the No Entry tile back onto this card DO NOT calculate influence on that island, or place any Towers
ARCHER: When resolving a Conquering on an Island Towers do not count towards influence
JUGGLER: You may take up to 3 Students from this card and replace them with the same number of Students form your Entrance
KNIGHT: During the influence calculation this turn, you count as having 2 more influence
COOKER: Choose a color of Student: during the influence calculation this turn, that color adds no influence
BARD: You may exchange up to 2 Students between your Entrance and your DiningRoom
PRINCESS: Take 1 Student fom this card and place it in your Dining Room.
Then, draw a new Student from the Bag and place it on this card.
GAMBLER: Choose a type of Student: every player (including yourself) must return 3 Students of that type from their Dining Room to the bag.
If any player has fewer than 3 Students of that type, return as many Students as they have
